loved atmosphere game loop art style music simple but expressive narrative disliked some mechanics are a bit obscure and hard to understand the first time which may mess up your run  this game is a fun and immersive sidescrolling tower defense experience the mechanics are simple and intuitive making it easy to learn the basics many mechanics are discovered through trial and error which can be a bit frustrating at first but becomes engaging as you uncover their depth over time
